title: Ministry of Transportation Reprimands Garuda to Improve 2024 Hajj Services - Kompas.id
text: [›](/) [English](/kategori/english)›Ministry of Transportation... Ministry of Transportation Reprimands Garuda to Improve 2024 Hajj Services The Ministry of Transportation asked PT Garuda Indonesia to give top priority in the national program for implementing Hajj transportation in 2024. About AI Translated Article Please note that this article was automatically translated using Microsoft Azure AI, Open AI, and Google Translation AI. We cannot ensure that the entire content is translated accurately. If you spot any errors or inconsistencies, contact us at [hotline@kompas.id](mailto:hotline@kompas.id), and we'll make every effort to address them. Thank you for your understanding. JAKARTA, KOMPAS — The Ministry of Transportation has reprimanded PT [Garuda Indonesia](https://www.kompas.id/label/garuda-indonesia?open_from=automate_body_url) regarding the many complaints and input regarding Garuda airline services in organizing the [2024 Hajj](https://www.kompas.id/label/haji-2024?open_from=automate_body_url). The Ministry of Transportation stated that it had taken firm action against Garuda to immediately improve its services. "We have listened to complaints filed by the community or other stakeholders regarding Garuda airline flights. Therefore, we have followed up on this matter by issuing a warning and taking strict action to ensure that some improvements are made immediately," said Minister of Transportation Budi Karya Sumadi in a press release on Friday (May 24, 2024).
